snippet: Congressional Republicans and Mitt Romney seized on a comment by President Obama — “the private sector is doing fine” — to criticize him as out of touch.
abstract: Republicans seize on comments made by Pres Obama during a news conference, in which he said 'the private sector is doing fine,' and Mitt Romney uses the phrase to paint Obama as out of touch.
lead_paragraph: Congressional Republicans and Mitt Romney seized on a comment by President Obama — “the private sector is doing fine” — to criticize him as out of touch.

headline.seo: Six Words From Obama, and a Barrage From Republicans
headline.main: Six Words From Obama, and a Barrage in Return From the G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Six Words From Obama, and a Barrage in Return From Republicans
